mapper.select: select * from post where id in (select post_id from topic_post where topic_id=#{topic_id}) order by create_time desc

SELECT DISTINCT p.id, u.username, u.userpic, p.create_time newstime, p.title, p.titlepic, p.language, count(DISTINCT c.id) comment_count, count(DISTINCT s.id) support_count FROM post AS p LEFT JOIN comment AS c ON p.id = c.post_id LEFT JOIN user AS u ON p.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN support AS s ON p.id = s.post_id WHERE exists ( select * from topic_post WHERE topic_id = #{topic_id} and p.id = post_id) GROUP BY p.id ORDER BY p.create_time DESC
